opinions.title: useFormStatus
opinions.body: The useFormStatus hook is used to get the form status of the current form. It returns an object with useful information like "pending"

opinions.title: Form Action in React
opinions.body: Using async with the form action function tells react to wait for the promise that is returned by this action function to resolve before it internally marks this form as submitted
